Dario Amoroso d'Aragona

Ph.D Student at Tampere University · dario.amorosodaragona@tuni.fi

The only way to do great work is to love what you do.


I'm Dario Amoroso d'Aragona, I was born in Fasano, Italy. I achieved the BSc in IT and the MSc in Computer Science at University of Bari. Since 2022 I'm a PhD student at Tampere University.
My research topic is Software Quality, focusing on Technical Debt.

Right now I'm working on (2022):
- SonarQube: the diffuseness of Technical Debt items in projects
- Testing of ai-based sytems: how and how well they are tested?
- Tool fo regression testing ")
- How the test suite evolvs during the development of system?
- Architectural Techinical Debt: How manage it?
